examInstructions.description: Replaces the top-level instruction text on the CHA exam pages (each page after starting page)

audiometryType.description: Type of audiometry exam to run

onlySubmitFrequenciesTested.Description: If true, only generate results for frequencies tested.  Default: false, submit all

levels.description: Array of levels to run in manual screener. Does not support DynamicStartLevel. Maximum length of array is 3.

items.description: Levels, in dB HL, to present the tones at.

presentationList.description: Array of frequencies to run in manual screener. Does not support DynamicStartLevel.

id.description: Custom presentationId to use for each frequency.  Optional - if not provided, parent id + Frequency will be used
